scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.update-all: npm update && npm audit fix && cd backend && npm update && npm audit fix && cd ../frontend && npm update && npm audit fix
scripts.lint: npm run --prefix backend lint && npm run --prefix frontend lint
scripts.lint:fix: npm run --prefix backend lint:fix && npm run --prefix frontend lint:fix
scripts.test: npm run --prefix backend test && npm run --prefix frontend test
